description:
I can cook anything I want... for free! You know why? Because I can earn by teaching what I cook. Isn't that what many of us wants to achieve - to do what we are really passionate about and at the same time earn from it?

If this is what you're looking for to achieve, then you've come to the right place. This course is about sharing how I make my online cooking classes on Udemy which have been one of my financial sources after I've published my very first cooking class.

In this course, I am teaching everything - from planning for the dishes that I will cook to promoting my published Udemy online cooking classes. After finishing this course, you can make your own cooking class!

I do not have a fancy kitchen. I do not have all the tools in the kitchen, all I have are the basic ones. I don't even have an oven, all I have is my passion for cooking. I'm only a home chef who loves to prepare dinner for my family and here I am now, teaching how I teach to share my ideas to others who are like me.

I'm glad that I found a way to monetize my everyday life and I thank Udemy for that. My life has changed ever since I published my first course.
title: Cook, Teach and Earn:  How I Make My Udemy Cooking Courses
